Articles.Content:
Hello,

I\'m a Kerbonaut since august and wanted to say hi !

After 9 iterations in building a munworthy rocket + lander with stock parts I have also landed on the Mun (unfortunately the last three crews where stranded due to no fuel / broken thruster on landing , others 'misinterpreted' the displayed sink/closure rate to the mun )

I\'m currently try to optimize my rockets for less parts due to performance issues with previous uncontrollable 170+ part spam rockets, currently at 115 with less thrusters more fuel (will try to post some lunar landing pics and latest designs in other subforums)

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

Did I mention that I donated immediately after first playing KSP ? ;D

Totally worth it !
